column4: hello please someone help.. i want to save a picture where I still have the layers unflattened.. what would be like tiff or psd on gimp?
save it as .xcf
thanks kevin!
np ;)
actually there seems to be something else wrong with it, since it wont even save it as that
but maybe I will just go to school tomorrow and do it there :)
what does the error say?
make sure you are saving it to a place you have permission to save it to
it is my own computer
maybe the layers are wrong somehow
I mean don't save it to a spot for administrators, try saving it to your home directory or desktop for example
if you tell me what the error says I might be able to help, I don't think it would be a problem with layers
it says it is an unknown filetype
save it as testpic.xcf  (no spaces or anything), what happens?
but i think i have saved tiff files before and i am picking the file types from gimps own list
did you try doing what I said?
yes i tried saving it in the filetype you told me to and to save it in the desktop etc
I'm not sure what the problem would be then. There is also an option under Save As that says "Select By Filetype", if that also doesn't work, then I don't know what else could be wrong
that worked! thanks so much.. so weird that it was refusing so much :)
you just saved me a trip to another part of the city and a lot of work
glad to see it worked! take care :)
you too!
